title: 9dcc's First Full NFT Fashion Collection Is Designed for the 'Crypto Mob'
description: Gmoney’s connected brand is bringing 9dcc Collection 01 to NFT Paris and Paris Fashion Week. Here’s a first look.

title: Coinbase Commerce Ditches Support for Bitcoin Payments Using Self-Custody Wallets
description: Coinbase Commerce, the cryptocurrency payments solution of U.S.-based exchange Coinbase, has removed support for bitcoin payments using self-custody wallets. Brian Armstrong, CEO of the exchange, clarified it maintains support for payments from UTXO-based chains from Coinbase accounts. However, Commerce will focus on supporting ERC-20 tokens on layer 2 protocols, like Base and Polygon. Coinbase Commerce […]

title: ECB responds to banking industry concerns over digital euro introduction
description: The European Central Bank (ECB) has recently made efforts to quell concerns surrounding the introduction of a digital euro, a central bank digital currency (CBDC). In a column published on February 19, ECB executives, including board member Piero Cipollone, addressed the banking industry’s apprehensions about potential disintermediation effects.  Despite including measures in the CBDC’s design […]

title: Why is Gary Gensler fighting with Wall Street?
description: Gary Gensler, the chair of the Securities and Exchange Commission, is not someone who blends into the background. With a passion that rivals the intensity of a Wall Street trading floor, Gensler has embarked on a crusade that could easily be mistaken for a Hollywood blockbuster plot. Only, in this scenario, the drama unfolds in […]

title: Dogecoin Price Prediction 2024-2033: DOGE to the Moon?
